name: $code
desc: Returns: The actual condition specified. Could be a coded condition (like MI or Diabetes) or a less specific string like 'cancer' depending on how much is known about the condition and the capabilities of the creating system.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The actual condition specified. Could be a coded condition (like MI or Diabetes) or a less specific string like 'cancer' depending on how much is known about the condition and the capabilities of the creating system.

name: $outcome
desc: Returns: Indicates what happened as a result of this condition.  If the condition resulted in death, deceased date is captured on the relation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates what happened as a result of this condition.  If the condition resulted in death, deceased date is captured on the relation.

name: $note
desc: Returns: An area where general notes can be placed about this specific condition.

name: $addnote
desc: An area where general notes can be placed about this specific condition.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An area where general notes can be placed about this specific condition.
